channel.title: Anyone else having trouble downloading it
channel.description: I have tried all the links and tried everything but nothing worked. I hope this gets on steam soon because I have waited so long for this and I really wanna play it. :frowning:

item.title: Anyone else having trouble downloading it
item.dc:creator: uncle_revie
item.description:
Crysis:

I have tried all the links and tried everything but nothing worked. I hope this gets on steam soon because I have waited so long for this and I really wanna play it.

Maybe theres too many people downloading?

i downloaded it from the german mirror luckily i can speak german

item.title: Anyone else having trouble downloading it
item.dc:creator: higgsboson
item.description:
Seriously, you should have no problems using the torrent. There are so many people seeding, it’s just a matter of time to get it. It took me 1 hour on a decent connection, but I would have easily accepted waiting 12 hours for it at this time. Just be patient and it should download steadily, if that’s the only problem?

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone else having trouble downloading it
item.dc:creator: Crysis
item.description:
Jokerine:

Tried the torrent? It has worked just fine for a lot of people. There’s a load of mirrorsnow, one is bound to work for you.

That didnt work either. Ill give the torrent another try tomorrow but Steam would be the ultimate place to download it for sure without any problems. It needs to get on steam asap.
